meanings.definition: Plants that can tolerate high levels of salt in their environment.
meanings.sent1: Halophytes like mangroves thrive in salty conditions.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study halophytes to understand how they survive in salty environments.
meanings.sent3: The halophytes at the beach had a salty secret garden.
meanings.sent4: In the land of halophytes, salt was their loyal companion.
meanings.sent5: The halophytes danced gracefully in the salty breeze.

meanings.definition: A plant that grows in salty soil or water.
meanings.sent1: The halophytes near the ocean have adapted to the salty soil.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen often see halophytes growing along the salty shores.
meanings.sent3: The halophytes in the pond threw a salty party.
meanings.sent4: The halophytes in the lake were like salty guardians of the water.
meanings.sent5: The halophytes painted the landscape with shades of salt.
